com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.provider

Interface ResourceProvider<R extends Resource<T>,T extends ResourceTemplate>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - type of the resource created by this provider
    T - type of the template required by this provider to create a resource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComputeProvider<R,T>, DatabaseServerProvider<R,T>, InstanceProvider<I,T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComputeProvider, AbstractDatabaseServerProvider, AbstractInstanceProvider, AbstractResourceProvider

    public interface ResourceProvider<R extends Resource<T>,T extends ResourceTemplate>
    Represents a provider of cloud resources.

    • Method Summary

      • createResourceTemplate

        configuration - the configuration
        tags - tags to be added to the resource
        Returns:
        a configured resource template

      • allocate

        Collection<? extends R> allocate(T template,
                                 Collection<String> resourceIds,
                                 int minCount)
                          throws InterruptedException

        Atomically allocates multiple resources with the specified identifiers based on a single resource template. More specifically, if at least minCount resources can be allocated, the allocated amount of resources will be returned.

        If minCount resources cannot be allocated, the method should fail by throwing an appropriate exception and should make a good-faith effort to not leak resources.

        Parameters:
        template - the resource template
        resourceIds - the unique identifiers for the resources
        minCount - the minimum number of resources to allocate if not all resources can be allocated
        Returns:
        the successfully allocated resources. If minCount can be satisfied, it will return a collection with resources equal to or greater than minCount in size. Otherwise it should throw an appropriate exception.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted

      • find

        Collection<? extends R> find(T template,
                             Collection<String> resourceIds)
                      throws InterruptedException
        Returns current resource information for the specified resources, which are guaranteed to have been created by this provider. This method takes resources, rather than resource identifiers, so that any additional information associated with the resource, such as its template, can be attached to the resulting resources.
        Parameters:
        template - the template that was used to create those resources
        resourceIds - the unique identifiers for the resources
        Returns:
        new resources, with the most currently available information, corresponding to the subset of the resources which still exist. Some or all of them may have null details if they are not fully ready for use
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted

      • delete

        void delete(T template,
            Collection<String> resourceIds)
     throws InterruptedException
        Permanently removes the specified resources, which are guaranteed to have been created by this provider.
        Parameters:
        template - the template used to create those resources
        resourceIds - the unique identifiers for the resources
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted
